translation.en: Is that you on the beach?
No, no. That's my... That's my mom.
Yeah. She came to this beach when she found out she was pregnant with me.
translation.es: Vino a esta playa cuando se embarazó conmigo.

translation.en: I've never been, but... it's kind of our beach.
translation.es: Yo no había venido, pero es como nuestra playa.

translation.en: You want to see more photos? I can...

translation.es: Esto es solo para tus ojos.

translation.en: My friend. You know, mi amiga.
You know, the girl we left back at the hotel? You know, she smelled like Don Julio... and bad choices?
translation.es: La chica que dejamos en el hotel. Olía a tequila y malas decisiones.

translation.en: She always does this to me, too. She just... she just disappears.
translation.es: Siempre hace lo mismo. Se desaparece.

translation.en: She's like the fantasmo, no? You know, you know fantasmo?
translation.es: Es como el fantasmo. ¿Sabes lo que es un fantasmo?

translation.en: The whole reason I planned to come on this trip, con A, was to find the secret beach.
translation.es: Planeé este viaje, con A, solo para encontrar la playa secreta.

translation.en: And now she's just stuck back at Las Rocas with the Irish flu.
translation.es: Y ahora se quedó en Las Rocas con la gripe irlandesa.

translation.en: You don't like it when someone change your plans, do you?
translation.es: No te gusta que te cambien los planes.

translation.en: No, I don't. No, I don't. It's just, you know. It's not fair.
translation.es: No, no me gusta. Es injusto.

translation.en: You know why, though? It's because I'm reliable.
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué? Porque yo soy confiable.

translation.en: Hey... what is this beach called?
You're not gonna tell me. Cool.
translation.es: No me vas a decir. Fantástico.

translation.en: Not possible. It's too hot here.
translation.es: No es posible. Hace mucho calor aquí.

translation.en: No, no, you're cool. You're being cool. Never mind, that's good.
translation.es: No, tú eres cool. Estás portándote cool. Olvídalo.

translation.en: No, we were going the same way. I live close by, so... don't worry.
translation.es: No, íbamos en la misma dirección. Vivo cerca de aquí. No te preocupes.

translation.en: - Carlos. Charlie. - Nice to meet you, Charlie.
I mean, I was in medical school, but we didn't have Spanish there,
translation.es: Digo, estaba estudiando medicina, pero ahí no había español,

translation.en: just cadavers. I'll shut up now.
translation.es: solo cadáveres. Me voy a callar.

translation.en: Okay, dark in a few hours, so...
translation.es: Va a oscurecer en unas horas.

translation.en: And... how you getting out from here?
Never mind. Thank you, Carlos. Thank you again for taking me here.
- It means a lot to me. - Okay.
What did you say the name of it was again, though? I just forgot for some reason.
translation.es: ¿Cómo dijiste que se llamaba la playa? Se me olvidó.

translation.en: He say that it is hard to paddle against the current.
translation.es: Dice que es duro remar contra la corriente.

translation.en: Yeah, I wasn't expecting that. I almost got caught on the inside coming out.
translation.es: Sí. No lo esperaba. Casi me agarró dentro.

translation.en: Yes, we have surf in Texas. It's just not like this, though.
translation.es: Sí, hay olas en Texas. Pero no como aquí.

translation.en: Hey, this is a secret break. How you find it?
translation.es: ¡Este es un rompedero secreto! ¿Cómo lo encontraste?

translation.en: Someone told me about it a while ago. What's it called?
translation.es: Alguien me contó de él. ¿Cómo se llama?

translation.en: If I tell you, I would have to kill you!
translation.es: ¡Si te digo, te tengo que matar!

translation.en: Well, that would ruin my day.
Anything gnarly out here I should know about?
translation.es: ¿Hay algún peligro del que debería saber?

translation.en: There's only one tide a day,
translation.es: Solo hay una marea al día.

translation.en: and when the tide gets low, it becomes an island.
translation.es: Y cuando baja la marea, se vuelve una isla.

translation.en: Still have no idea what you're saying.
translation.es: No tengo idea de qué estás diciendo.

translation.en: He's saying that you should come over here.
I'm okay, I'm okay. I'm cool here, thank you.
Careful, gringa. It's rough out here for a little girl from Texas.
translation.es: Ten cuidado, gringa. Es un lugar duro para una chica de Texas.

translation.en: I think I'll be all right.
Oh, my God. No way. Mom's beach, right?
translation.es: Ay, Dios. No puede ser. Es la playa de mamá, ¿no?

translation.en: It's just as beautiful as she said it was.
I wish you were here. I wish she was here.
translation.es: Ojalá estuvieras aquí. Ojalá estuviera ella aquí.

translation.en: Well, I wasn't gonna come all this way just to wuss out because I lost my plus- one.
translation.es: No iba a venir hasta aquí para acobardarme porque mi amiga me falló.

translation.en: That's how you wind up on Nancy Grace, okay?
translation.es: Así es como acabas en el noticiero.

translation.en: Excuse me. I am supposed to be the boring, overprotective sister. You are supposed to be the fun one.
translation.es: Se supone que yo soy la hermana sobreprotectora. Tú eres la parrandera.

translation.en: Sis, the surf here, it's insane.
You would not believe the perfect tube I just caught.
I could shoot tubes just as good as you, if you would just take me out!
translation.es: ¡Yo podría agarrar tubos tan bien como tú si me llevaras contigo!

translation.en: I'll take you. I'll take you out as soon as I get back.
- I love you, too, Short Crop. - Is that Nancy?
- It's Dad. - Just tell him it's all fine, okay?
- Love you. Bye. - No, it's, it's a friend.
I don't know what to say, Nance. I'm at a loss.
translation.es: No sé qué decir. No tengo palabras.

translation.en: - I don't-- I don't-- I can't understand-- - I don't expect you to.
translation.es: No logro entender. - No espero que entiendas. - Entonces ayúdame.
- No espero que entiendas. - Entonces ayúdame.

translation.en: I don't know. What do you... What do you want me to say?
Well, say you're coming back. Say you're not dropping out of med school after all this time, after all this work.
translation.es: Que no vas a dejar de estudiar medicina después de tanto esfuerzo.

translation.en: - You know, just don't quit. - Okay, Dad.
translation.es: No lo abandones. Ya basta. ¿Podemos dejar este tema ahora?

translation.en: That's enough. Can we just not do this right now, please?
translation.es: Ya basta. ¿Podemos dejar este tema ahora?

translation.en: It's what you love. You help people.
translation.es: Te encanta. Le ayudas a la gente.

translation.en: Well, not everyone can be helped, Dad. You... You know that.
translation.es: No a todos se les puede ayudar. Tú lo sabes.

translation.en: Don't make this about her. What else would it be about?
translation.es: - No vuelvas esto acerca de ella. - Si no, ¿de qué?

translation.en: If you want to make this about her, then you stay in it.
translation.es: Si quieres que sea acerca de ella, no lo abandones.

translation.en: It's just she fought too hard, Dad.
I gotta go, okay? I'll see you soon.
translation.es: Ya me voy. Nos vemos pronto.

translation.en: Yeah, girl, it's getting late. Let's go in.
translation.es: Chica, es súper tarde. Vámonos a la playa.

translation.en: I'm gonna catch one last one. Thanks.
- Nice meeting you guys. - See you later, guera.
No, no, no. Where are you taking me?
You're not gonna feel a thing, ma'am.
I just put some Novocain injections to... numb the area, so...
translation.es: Le puse unas inyecciones de novocaína... para adormecer el área, así que...

translation.en: you're just gonna feel a little pressure, but...
translation.es: ...solo sentirá un poco de presión, pero no...

translation.en: you're not gonna feel the stitches, okay? Okay?
Yeah. That's a nice... That's a nice union.
One more, and then we'll send you on your way.
translation.es: Una más y la mandamos a casa.

translation.en: Just keep it elevated, ma'am. Someone's coming.
translation.es: Manténgala elevada, señorita. Alguien va a venir.

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're gonna be fine.
Now let's loosen this tourniquet for you.
translation.es: No fluye bastante con el torniquete.

translation.en: Okay, you get two minutes of blood flow.
translation.es: Te tocan dos minutos de flujo de sangre.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait. My backpack.
Come back, you can have it!
You can have it! Come back!
Wait! It's okay! Just don't go!
Stop! Get out of the water!
Don't worry about it! There's no sharks here!
Come on! Come on, come on, swim!
I got you! Come on! Come on!
You're okay. I'm helping you, little buddy.
translation.es: Estás bien. Te voy a ayudar, amiguito.

translation.en: I'm not very good at ortho, but it just looks like a dislocation.
translation.es: No soy buena ortopedista, pero parece solo una dislocación.

translation.en: I'm just gonna do this quick, okay?
It's gonna hurt just for a second,
translation.es: Te va a doler solo un segundo...

translation.en: and then you're gonna be okay.
translation.es: ...y luego te vas a sentir bien.

translation.en: That's a terrible way to say thank you.
Thirty- two seconds from the whale to the rock.
translation.es: Unos 32 segundos de la ballena a la roca.

translation.en: Come on, I got you! I got you!
I got you! I got you!
This is Nancy Adams. It's April 26, 2016.
translation.es: Soy Nancy Adams. Hoy es el 26 de abril de 2016.

translation.en: If you find this, please send help right away. I've been attacked by a shark.
translation.es: Si encuentran esto, manden ayuda. Me atacó un tiburón.

translation.en: He's killed three other people since I got here.
translation.es: Ha matado a tres personas más.

translation.en: He's got this big old whale over here, but that-- That's the problem.
translation.es: Tiene una ballena grande ahí. Pero ese es el problema.

translation.en: I swam right up onto his feeding ground.
translation.es: Entré a su coto de caza.

translation.en: I've been bitten pretty deeply into my... my gastroc and quad muscles.
translation.es: Me mordió profundamente en mi gastrocnemio y mi cuádriceps.

translation.en: I have a deep gash running vertically down my medial thigh,
translation.es: Tengo una rajada profunda en mi muslo intermedio

translation.en: and then it turns lateral, just above my knee.
translation.es: y se vuelve lateral sobre la rodilla.

translation.en: And right here, there's one going across my, my posterior calf.
translation.es: Tengo otra rajada en el muslo posterior.

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of blood. Gangrene is setting in.
translation.es: Estoy perdiendo mucha sangre. Veo venir la gangrena.

translation.en: I feel like I'm losing my strength.
I don't think I have much time.
The island I'm on is gonna be taken by the tide in a few minutes.
translation.es: La marea cubrirá la isla en la que estoy en unos minutos.

translation.en: I'm about 200 yards off the shore. On this beach.
translation.es: Estoy a unos 200 metros de la arena en esta playa.

translation.en: I never found out what it was called.
There's a buoy, which I'm gonna try to swim to,
translation.es: Ahí está la boya, a la que voy a nadar.

translation.en: If you find this, can you just...
Can you just delete that first part and...
translation.es: ...borrar por favor la primera parte y mandarlo

translation.en: And send it to 10231 Oliver Crescent Drive,
translation.es: ...borrar por favor la primera parte y mandarlo a Oliver Crescent Drive 10231...

translation.en: That's my home. That's where my... That's where my dad and sister live.
translation.es: Ese es mi hogar. Ahí viven mi papá y mi hermana.

translation.en: I finally got that alone time.
translation.es: Por fin conseguí mi tiempo a solas.

translation.en: I mean, I'm not totally alone.
I got this little dude, Steven Seagull here, keeping me company.
translation.es: Tengo a este amiguito, Steven Gaviota, haciéndome compañía.

translation.en: I fixed him for you, Chlo.
I just don't want you guys to worry, and I don't want you to feel...
translation.es: No quiero que se preocupen. No quiero que se sientan...

translation.en: you know, bad or anything, 'cause... I love you so much,
translation.es: ...mal ni nada, porque los quiero muchísimo.

translation.en: and I miss you more than I ever... I ever even realized I could.
translation.es: Los extraño más de lo que me imaginaba que podía extrañarlos.

translation.en: Dad, I gotta get off this rock soon,
translation.es: Papá, tengo que bajarme de esta roca pronto.

translation.en: but I want you to know I'm gonna fight.
translation.es: Pero quiero que sepas que voy a luchar.

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay. You got it. Good job.
You didn't like that, 'cause it stings like jellyfish.
translation.es: Eso no te gustó porque arde como las medusas.
Hoy es el 26 de abril de 2016.

translation.en: If you find this, please send help right away.
I've been attacked by a shark. He's killed three other people since I got here.
translation.es: Me atacó un tiburón. Ha matado a tres personas más.

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of blood.
I feel like I'm losing my strength.
I love you more, Short Crop.

translation.es: No puede ser. ¿Es la playa de mamá?
No a todos se les puede ayudar.

translation.en: I don't want you to feel, you know, bad or anything.
translation.es: No quiero que se sientan mal ni nada.

translation.en: I gotta go, Dad. I'll see you later.
- Hey, sweet pea. ...she was a fighter. - I could shoot tubes...
I'm gonna fight, just like she taught us.
translation.es: Voy a luchar, como ella nos enseñó.

translation.en: Ready to get wet, Dr. Adams?
Ma would be proud of you. Both of you.
translation.es: Mamá estaría orgullosa de ti. De las dos.
Gracias, papá. Es hora de meterse.

translation.en: Do you think I'll ever be as good as you? No.
translation.es: - ¿Llegaré a ser tan buena como tú? - No.
